data.message: There needs to be a way for people to opt out of having "trending topics" appear on their page.

replies.message: Hi Nicki. You can help customize your list of trending topics by hiding topics you don't want to see. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2bn8hgz. -Colleen
Dear Facebook page I want to document the official brand blue What are the requirements have

Hey there. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2b71zHQ. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/2bpnKMQ. -Kate

Facebook  Yes, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE bring back the old trending feed! Could care less about the data numbers! I enjoyed seeing the short descriptions! Bring it back! Aloha!
